pond_life.source_phrase: big and little animals live at a pond
pond_life.meaning_en: to reside or inhabit a specific place
pond_life.example_en: Many birds live at the pond during summer.
pond_life.example_vi: Nhiều loài chim sống tại ao vào mùa hè.

pond_life.source_phrase: why do they live there?
pond_life.meaning_en: in or at that place
pond_life.example_en: The frogs are happy there by the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Những con ếch vui vẻ ở đó bên ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: a pond is filled with food
pond_life.meaning_en: is full of or contains a large amount of
pond_life.example_en: The room is filled with books.
pond_life.example_vi: Căn phòng được lấp đầy bởi sách.

pond_life.source_phrase: lots of pond animals eat water plants and bugs
pond_life.meaning_en: many animals that live in or near a pond
pond_life.example_en: Lots of pond animals rely on plants for food.
pond_life.example_vi: Nhiều động vật ở ao phụ thuộc vào thực vật để lấy thức ăn.

pond_life.source_phrase: a few eat each other
pond_life.meaning_en: one another, used to show reciprocal action
pond_life.example_en: Some fish eat each other in the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Một số con cá ăn lẫn nhau trong ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: big animals eat little animals like frogs
pond_life.meaning_en: a small amphibian with long legs, often living near water
pond_life.example_en: The frog jumped into the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con ếch nhảy vào ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: and some tiny bugs eat other bugs!
pond_life.meaning_en: a small number of very small insects
pond_life.meaning_vi: một vài con côn trùng nhỏ
pond_life.example_en: Some tiny bugs live on the pond's surface.
pond_life.example_vi: Một vài con côn trùng nhỏ sống trên mặt ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: ducks and geese eat water plants
pond_life.meaning_en: a bird that lives near water and has webbed feet
pond_life.example_en: The duck swam across the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con vịt bơi ngang qua ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: ducks and geese eat water plants
pond_life.meaning_en: plural of goose, a large waterbird with a long neck
pond_life.example_en: Geese were grazing near the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Những con ngỗng đang gặm cỏ gần ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: these animals have webbed feet
pond_life.meaning_en: feet with skin between the toes, aiding in swimming
pond_life.example_en: Ducks have webbed feet for swimming.
pond_life.example_vi: Vịt có chân màng để bơi.

pond_life.source_phrase: a swan uses its long neck for reaching plants under the water
pond_life.meaning_en: the elongated neck of an animal, used for reaching
pond_life.example_en: The swan uses its long neck to find food.
pond_life.example_vi: Con thiên nga dùng cổ dài để tìm thức ăn.

pond_life.source_phrase: a swan uses its long neck for reaching plants under the water
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of extending or stretching to touch or grasp something
pond_life.example_en: The swan is reaching for plants under the water.
pond_life.example_vi: Con thiên nga đang vươn tới thực vật dưới nước.

pond_life.source_phrase: some animals live at the edge of a pond
pond_life.meaning_en: the boundary or margin of a pond
pond_life.example_en: Frogs often live at the edge of a pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Ếch thường sống ở bờ ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: the long legs of a crane work well for wading
pond_life.meaning_en: the extended limbs of an animal, used for specific purposes
pond_life.example_en: The long legs of a crane help it wade in water.
pond_life.example_vi: Đôi chân dài của con sếu giúp nó lội nước.

pond_life.source_phrase: the long legs of a crane work well for wading
pond_life.meaning_en: a large bird with long legs and neck, often found near water
pond_life.example_en: The crane stood tall by the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con sếu đứng cao bên ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: the long legs of a crane work well for wading
pond_life.meaning_en: function effectively for a purpose
pond_life.example_en: These boots work well for hiking.
pond_life.example_vi: Đôi giày này hoạt động tốt cho việc đi bộ đường dài.

pond_life.source_phrase: the long legs of a crane work well for wading
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of walking through water
pond_life.example_en: The crane was wading in the shallow pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con sếu đang lội nước ở ao nông.

pond_life.source_phrase: this crane has dipped its head into the water to grab a snack
pond_life.meaning_en: has lowered or submerged briefly
pond_life.example_en: The bird has dipped its beak into the water.
pond_life.example_vi: Con chim đã nhúng mỏ vào nước.

pond_life.source_phrase: this crane has dipped its head into the water to grab a snack
pond_life.meaning_en: to take or seize suddenly
pond_life.example_en: The crane tried to grab a fish from the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con sếu cố nắm lấy một con cá từ ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: frogs lay their eggs in water
pond_life.meaning_en: to produce and deposit eggs
pond_life.example_en: Frogs lay their eggs in the pond each spring.
pond_life.example_vi: Ếch đẻ trứng trong ao mỗi mùa xuân.

pond_life.source_phrase: many frogs are next to water all their lives
pond_life.meaning_en: the duration of their existence
pond_life.example_en: Frogs stay near water all their lives.
pond_life.example_vi: Ếch ở gần nước suốt cuộc đời của chúng.

pond_life.source_phrase: but their long legs are for hopping, not wading!
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of jumping on one or both feet
pond_life.example_en: Frogs are great at hopping on land.
pond_life.example_vi: Ếch rất giỏi nhảy lò cò trên cạn.

pond_life.source_phrase: tiny bugs skim on top of a pond to chase food
pond_life.meaning_en: to move quickly over a surface, barely touching it
pond_life.example_en: Water bugs skim across the pond's surface.
pond_life.example_vi: Côn trùng nước lướt qua mặt ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: tiny bugs skim on top of a pond to chase food
pond_life.meaning_en: to pursue food in order to catch or obtain it
pond_life.example_en: Insects chase food across the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Côn trùng đuổi theo thức ăn trên mặt ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: a turtle is sunning on a log
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of resting in the sun to warm up
pond_life.example_en: The turtle is sunning on a rock by the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con rùa đang phơi nắng trên một tảng đá bên ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: a turtle is sunning on a log
pond_life.meaning_en: a piece of a tree trunk or branch
pond_life.example_en: The turtle rested on a log in the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Con rùa nghỉ trên một khúc gỗ trong ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: it just snapped up a bug that tried to fly by!
pond_life.meaning_en: to seize or grab quickly
pond_life.example_en: The turtle snapped up a bug flying nearby.
pond_life.example_vi: Con rùa chộp lấy một con côn trùng bay gần đó.

pond_life.source_phrase: it just snapped up a bug that tried to fly by!
pond_life.meaning_en: attempted to move past quickly by flying
pond_life.example_en: The insect tried to fly by the turtle.
pond_life.example_vi: Con côn trùng cố bay qua con rùa.

pond_life.source_phrase: under the water, many fish are swimming
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of moving through water using limbs or fins
pond_life.example_en: Fish are swimming in the pond.
pond_life.example_vi: Cá đang bơi trong ao.

pond_life.source_phrase: the fish are eating as they are gliding through the water
pond_life.meaning_en: the act of moving smoothly and effortlessly
pond_life.example_en: The fish are gliding through the water gracefully.
pond_life.example_vi: Cá lướt đi trong nước một cách uyển chuyển.

pond_life.source_phrase: the pond is filled with food for them
pond_life.meaning_en: is full of or contains a large amount of
pond_life.example_en: The pond is filled with plants and insects.
pond_life.example_vi: Ao được lấp đầy bởi thực vật và côn trùng.
